PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2010-11792010-09-30,  ,  ,  ,  ,  CITIZENSHIP, 
ActCitizenship Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Citizenship Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the CITIZENSHIP REGULATIONS to enable a more complete assessment of knowledge to test citizenship applicants against the breadth of content of Discover Canada, the new citizenship study guide published in November, 2009, and to promote an enhanced understanding of Canadian identity, responsibilities and privileges of citizenship.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2010-0209 Publication Date: 2010-10-13
AttachmentsAttachment
